summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'IMPLEMENTATION:We', 'CTS', 'RESULTS:Complementing', 'MOTIVATION:Patterns' | Using multiple measurements of tissue to estimate subject- and cell-type-specific gene expression | Using Multiple Measurements of Tissue to Estimate Subject- And Cell-Type-Specific Gene Expression via Deconvolution | MIND (Multi-measure INdividual Deconvolution) | MIND is a method to glean insights from bulk gene expression. It borrows information across multiple measurements of the same tissue per subject, such as multiple regions of the brain, using an empirical Bayes approach to estimate subject- and cell-type-specific gene expression via deconvolution
summary.name: MIND
